author: The Linux Foundation
description:
Generative AI is transforming industries, but how can business leaders leverage its potential while avoiding costly missteps? This executive-focused webinar explores the real-world applications of GenAI and distinguishes practical use cases from the hype. This 45-minute webinar features expert insights needed to make confident, strategic decisions about GenAI adoption in a sustainable and cost-effective way from Henry Levenberg, Business AI Strategist, Konozco.

You will walk away:
1. Understanding where and in what use cases GenAI should and shouldn’t be used.
2. Ready to develop a framework for evaluating GenAI trends to make informed decisions.
3. Prepared to integrate GenAI into their business strategy in a sustainable and affordable way.
4. With increased confidence to assess GenAI’s role in driving business growth and innovation.

Learn more about all the AI courses Linux Foundation Education offers at: https://training.linuxfoundation.org/
title: GenAI for Executives

author: The Linux Foundation
description:
Google didn’t open source Kubernetes to give up competitive advantage. They did it to gain one.

Open source reshaped cloud infrastructure, helped level the playing field, and powered innovation at scale.
Today, U.S. companies are using the same playbook to lead the next wave of cost-effective, high-performance tech.

#OpenSource #CloudComputing #Kubernetes
title: How Giants Use Open Source for Competitive Edge
